summary: This code reads input data from standard input, converts it into a string using UTF-8 encoding, and then loads the JSON object. Finally, it prints the loaded JSON object.

details.comment: This code reads input data from standard input, converts it into a string using UTF-8 encoding, and then loads the JSON object. Finally, it prints the loaded JSON object.
details.content:
import sys
bytebuffer = bytearray()
for x in sys.stdin.buffer.read():
    bytebuffer.append(x)
string = bytes(bytebuffer).decode("utf-8")
#print(string,end="")
import json
target = json.loads(string)
print(target)
